  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/AdamAfriyie" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Adam Afriyie</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/AdamAfriyie">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">AdamAfriyie</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>


      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">MP for Windsor since 2005. Prime Minister's Trade Envoy to Ghana &amp; Guinea. Chair of Fintech APPG. Constituents please contact my parliamentary office.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Windsor &amp; Westminster

        </span>
      </div>

    adamafriyie.org
  </a>

</span>
      </div>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">An excellent evening at the Sunningdale quiz tonight. Thanks to my team Sharper Minds for the win, despite my rather minor contribution! And thanks to John Story &amp; Herta Morris as quiz master. Wonderful night.</p>
</div>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>

Bright girls. Our Gov. now spends only what it gets in taxes for the first time since about 2002.         <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Encouraging news from the Government on mental health.     <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Spoke about trade opportunities in Africa and took questions about the role of the PMs Trade Envoys in forging global trade &amp; business links alongside <a href="/JeremyLefroy" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="417975170"><s>@</s><b>JeremyLefroy</b></a> &amp; Baroness Northolt at the Business Council for Africa event <a href="/tradegovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14431752"><s>@</s><b>tradegovuk</b></a> <a href="/foreignoffice" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14353202"><s>@</s><b>foreignoffice</b></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Adam Afriyie Retweeted Genomics England</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">Encouraging news that <a href="/GenomicsEngland" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1552637701"><s>@</s><b>GenomicsEngland</b></a> is halfway to completing their 100,000 Genomes Project. Anyone interested in a primer should check out the <a href="/POST_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="22506791"><s>@</s><b>POST_UK</b></a> note <a href="https://t.co/GbuFAVGnm4" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/POST-PN-0504" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/POST-PN-0504"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefi</span><span class="invisible">ng/Summary/POST-PN-0504</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/genomes100k?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>genomes100k</b></a><a href="https://t.co/1N2Zm9KyJf" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/GenomicsEngland/status/965921637412589573" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/GenomicsEngland/status/965921637412589573"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/GenomicsEnglan</span><span class="invisible">d/status/965921637412589573</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Adam Afriyie added,</p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">21</span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Heathrow is already the worst option for airport expansion in terms of the environment.   <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">Delighted to open the international trade <a href="/hashtag/Fintech?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Fintech</b></a> conference this morning, encouraging Fintech businesses to locate &amp; invest in the UK <a href="/tradegovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14431752"><s>@</s><b>tradegovuk</b></a> <a href="/APPGFinTech" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3388959527"><s>@</s><b>APPGFinTech</b></a> <a href="/foreignoffice" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14353202"><s>@</s><b>foreignoffice</b></a><a href="https://t.co/TObFBp9wz0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/investingreat/status/963349324573835265" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/investingreat/status/963349324573835265"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/investingreat/</span><span class="invisible">status/963349324573835265</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Adam Afriyie Retweeted Greg Hands</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">Marvellous news <a href="/GregHands" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="125270251"><s>@</s><b>GregHands</b></a>. UK Businesses should be confident about continuity and stability in the short term and optimistic about the work <a href="/tradegovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14431752"><s>@</s><b>tradegovuk</b></a> are doing to open us up to the world in the longer term<a href="https://t.co/c91Vt3bs2Y" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/GregHands/status/956117295599968256" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/GregHands/status/956117295599968256"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/GregHands/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/956117295599968256</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Adam Afriyie added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">The governments own revised figures show Gatwick would be better for the economy, but we shouldnt forget that Heathrows environmental consequences make it a non-starter <a href="https://t.co/HXXrRNYym8" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://vimeo.com/247598441" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://vimeo.com/247598441"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">vimeo.com/247598441</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a> <a href="/NoR3Coalition" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="843635139557146624"><s>@</s><b>nor3coalition</b></a> <a href="/RBWM" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20701800"><s>@</s><b>RBWM</b></a> <a href="/HACAN1" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="45105017"><s>@</s><b>HACAN1</b></a> <a href="/StopHeathrowExp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2862396683"><s>@</s><b>StopHeathrowExp</b></a> <a href="/sloughadar3" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="918511719139500033"><s>@</s><b>sloughadar3</b></a> <a href="/RAAN_BERKS" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="702580568446377986"><s>@</s><b>RAAN_BERKS</b></a> <a href="/colnbrookca" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3393998945"><s>@</s><b>colnbrookca</b></a></p>

  </ul>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Adam Afriyie Retweeted Isabel Hardman</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">...and youre doing a great job Isabel, in a tough profession that is mentally &amp; emotionally demanding, thats for sure :-)<a href="https://t.co/VtF9mXO05W" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/isabelhardman/status/940350796578873345" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/isabelhardman/status/940350796578873345"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/isabelhardman/</span><span class="invisible">status/940350796578873345</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Adam Afriyie added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet
    
    
    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/IsabelHardman/status/940350796578873345" data-conversation-id="940350796578873345" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="940350796578873345" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="IsabelHardman" data-user-id="162044153" href="/IsabelHardman/status/940350796578873345" data-conversation-id="940350796578873345" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Isabel Hardman</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>IsabelHardman</b></span>
  </div>

          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr" lang="en">I dont know how long it will last, but after about a month of despair, the fog in my mind has lifted. Is so amazing when your mind starts working again. Extraordinary. Am still prouder of my fight against mental illness than anything else Ive done.</div>
        </div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Thankfully, driverless cars can transform road safety <a href="https://t.co/EvCsfZRA9o" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.roadcrashindex.org/results/berkshire/road-map" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.roadcrashindex.org/results/berkshire/road-map"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">roadcrashindex.org/results/berksh</span><span class="invisible">ire/road-map</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a> <a href="/IAMRoadSmart" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="54506174"><s>@</s><b>IAMRoadSmart</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/RoadCrashIndex?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RoadCrashIndex</b></a> <a href="/SafeRoadDesign" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="93154290"><s>@</s><b>SafeRoadDesign</b></a> <a href="/AgeasUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1042492910"><s>@</s><b>AgeasUK</b></a> <a href="/BritishInsurers" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="50318476"><s>@</s><b>BritishInsurers</b></a></p>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Huge thanks to Dominic Grieve MP for speaking at our Horton &amp; Wraysbury branch annual dinner at The George, Wraysbury. A Conservative party united in seeking the best Brexit.  <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> <a href="/WindsorTories" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4240852541"><s>@</s><b>WindsorTories</b></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Dont be fooled: The Animal Rights amendment to the EU Withdrawal Bill was cynically designed to dupe people with false headlines. It would create legal confusion. Animal sentience is already  protected by the UK Animal Rights Act 2006 &amp; EU protections will become UK law.</p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">5</span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Good to support Payment Systems Order in Statutory Committee this morning. We must continue to keep our financial services &amp; FinTech sectors safe, secure &amp; in No. 1 slot worldwide <a href="/APPGFinTech" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3388959527"><s>@</s><b>APPGFinTech</b></a> <a href="/hmtreasury" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18904582"><s>@</s><b>hmtreasury</b></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">And you are very much welcome Mr President. Our bilateral trade, common security interests and diplomatic relations will bring our nations closer together <a href="/NAkufoAddo" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="247217109"><s>@</s><b>NAkufoAddo</b></a> <a href="/number10gov" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="963912251068571648"><s>@</s><b>Number10gov</b></a> <a href="/tradegovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14431752"><s>@</s><b>tradegovuk</b></a> <a href="/foreignoffice" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14353202"><s>@</s><b>foreignoffice</b></a> <a href="/DFID_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19915362"><s>@</s><b>DFID_UK</b></a><a href="https://t.co/iVn1EhugYW" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/nakufoaddo/status/932875110981292033" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/nakufoaddo/status/932875110981292033"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/nakufoaddo/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/932875110981292033</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>

Just 42.5% of Windsor households were connected to superfast in 2010. Now its 94% <a href="https://t.co/PUJq6kXfbZ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://adamafriyie.org/?p=2914" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://adamafriyie.org/?p=2914"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">adamafriyie.org/?p=2914</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">7</span>
  </span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">Canadian trade talks show UK looking to be more open <a href="/hashtag/postBrexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>postBrexit</b></a>, not inward-looking &amp; protectionist like some in the EU <a href="/iealondon" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="57602189"><s>@</s><b>iealondon</b></a><a href="https://t.co/T8uyhDUZT0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/909761184710217728" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/909761184710217728"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/909761184710217728</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Good to vote through the EU Withdrawal Bill this morning with 318 votes defeating Labour's recking amendment.</p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Adam Afriyie Retweeted Department for International Trade</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">More good news for the UK. Let's continue to embrace opportunities to increase trade worldwide as we leave the EU <a href="/tradegovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14431752"><s>@</s><b>tradegovuk</b></a> <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a><a href="https://t.co/5M8fi1h5pm" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/tradegovuk/status/895667321137528834" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/tradegovuk/status/895667321137528834"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/tradegovuk/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/895667321137528834</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Adam Afriyie added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet
    
    
    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/tradegovuk/status/895667321137528834" data-conversation-id="895667321137528834" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="895667321137528834" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="tradegovuk" data-user-id="14431752" href="/tradegovuk/status/895667321137528834" data-conversation-id="895667321137528834" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Department for International Trade</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>tradegovuk</b></span>
  </div>

          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr" lang="en">Since the EU referendum UK exports have increased by 11.4%, as British goods and services are in demand across the world, ONS figures show. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/g2HzRkKYFU</span></div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Adam Afriyie Retweeted Department for International Trade</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">Removing the barriers to international trade removes the barriers to economic development worldwide <a href="/hashtag/FreeTrade?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>FreeTrade</b></a> <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a><a href="https://t.co/kq5BWNIEXg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/tradegovuk/status/887945382097014788" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/tradegovuk/status/887945382097014788"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/tradegovuk/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/887945382097014788</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Adam Afriyie added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

</div>

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Delighted to cast my vote at the very busy Old Windsor polling station...please remember to vote <a href="/hashtag/VoteConservative2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>VoteConservative2017</b></a> <a href="/WindsorTories" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4240852541"><s>@</s><b>WindsorTories</b></a><a href="https://t.co/nLgJB8neDL" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/nLgJB8neDL</a></p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Adam Afriyie Retweeted Theresa May</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">Our PM sums up the election in my view. I'll be campaigning for a strong mandate locally &amp; nationally for <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> led by <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>Theresa_May</b></a><a href="https://t.co/cGAkuEGVkY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/859452229350195201" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/859452229350195201"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/theresa_may/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/859452229350195201</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/AdamAfriyie" data-user-id="22031058">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">53</span>
  </span>

      </li>
  </ul>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="0" lang="en">Good news for academic researchers in <a href="/hashtag/budget2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>budget2017</b></a>. 1,000 new PhD places, 85% of which will be STEM <a href="/sciencecampaign" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20523099"><s>@</s><b>sciencecampaign</b></a> <a href="/senseaboutsci" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="45579282"><s>@</s><b>senseaboutsci</b></a><a href="https://t.co/CfmBiVyot5" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CfmBiVyot5</a></p>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this to make your timeline better.

  </ul>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">Forget our minor quibbles about late nights &amp; minor ailments. Nick is a friend and an MP of which we can be proud. See you later.<a href="https://t.co/4ici0K4XwE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/guidofawkes/status/828950459796901888" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/guidofawkes/status/828950459796901888"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/guidofawkes/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/828950459796901888</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>

      <div class="QuoteTweet

  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/GuidoFawkes/status/828950459796901888" data-conversation-id="828950459796901888" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">Excellent report by <a href="/reformthinktank" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="103012926"><s>@</s><b>reformthinktank</b></a>. Id advise anyone interested to read <a href="/POST_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="22506791"><s>@</s><b>POST_UK</b></a> s note on automation <a href="https://t.co/S35CewpBeM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/POST-PN-0534" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/POST-PN-0534"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefi</span><span class="invisible">ng/Summary/POST-PN-0534</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/Rok35OOz2D" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/reformthinktank/status/828558979013951488" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/reformthinktank/status/828558979013951488"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/reformthinktan</span><span class="invisible">k/status/828558979013951488</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Adam Afriyie added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet
    
    
    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/reformthinktank/status/828558979013951488" data-conversation-id="828558979013951488" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="828558979013951488" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="reformthinktank" data-user-id="103012926" href="/reformthinktank/status/828558979013951488" data-conversation-id="828558979013951488" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" data-aria-label-part="4" lang="en">It was a great pleasure to chair the <a href="/hashtag/POST2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>POST2017</b></a> panel on Science, Innovation and the <a href="/hashtag/IndustrialStrategy?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IndustrialStrategy</b></a> @JoJohnsonMP <a href="/RAEngNews" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="348352704"><s>@</s><b>RAEngNews</b></a> <a href="/CBItweets" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="40010267"><s>@</s><b>CBItweets</b></a><a href="https://t.co/cdhMNvdKWL" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/POST_UK/status/824582060467748864" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/POST_UK/status/824582060467748864"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/POST_UK/status</span><span class="invisible">/824582060467748864</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="embed-tweet-instructions">Add this Tweet to your website by copying the code below. <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/web/embedded-tweets" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a></p>
  <p class="embed-video-instructions">Add this video to your website by copying the code below. <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/web/embedded-tweets" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a></p>
  <form class="t1-form">

    <div class="embed-destination-wrapper">
      <div class="embed-overlay embed-overlay-spinner"><div class="embed-overlay-content"></div></div>
      <div class="embed-overlay embed-overlay-error">
        <p class="embed-overlay-content">Hmm, there was a problem reaching the server. <button type="button" class="btn-link retry-embed">Try again?</button></p>
      </div>
      <textarea class="embed-destination js-initial-focus"></textarea>
      <div class="embed-options">
        <div class="embed-include-parent-tweet">

          </label>

      </div>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
